name: What will this affect?
description:
only leaves? will it deep search parents to see if nothing below them matches? or excluding parents (and thus ALL children) if a parent matches?
only the leaves is certainly enough for now; the recursing to children isn't something I want to do client side. excluding parent's is probably fine. I mostly want to "remove everything that is done" for starters, and so I'll bubble that up to parents when everything under them is done ~ Don't confuse filters with queries. if I want to see "only things that are in progress" then that'll be a query/list, not a filter
